nodes.description: 爆炸发生在贝鲁特东部的Melki超市附近，一辆装有440磅 nail-studded TNT的汽车被远程引爆，造成地面出现3英尺深、12英尺宽的坑洞
nodes.support_text: Fifteen people, several of them children, were killed Wednesday when a Mercedes packed with 440 pounds of nail-studded TNT and mortar shells exploded outside an apartment block in a Christian neighborhood in East Beirut.

nodes.description: 爆炸8小时后从超市地下室挖出15具尸体，消防员和基督教民兵在浓烟中连续4小时施救，多名被困人员因吸入烟雾窒息死亡
nodes.support_text: Fifteen bodies were dug from the basement storeroom eight hours after the blast, and a search for other victims continued well after nightfall.

nodes.description: 爆炸后两小时内，消防员和民兵通过枪击疏通交通，造成2名平民中枪受伤
nodes.support_text: Screaming Christian militiamen fired rifles to clear a path through traffic for ambulances. The police said two people were wounded by the gunfire.

nodes.description: 救援人员确认超市废墟中大量遗体严重烧焦无法辨认，警方通报30名伤者处于危重状态
nodes.support_text: Rescuers said many bodies were charred beyond recognition. The police had said earlier that 30 of the wounded were in serious condition.

nodes.description: 爆炸发生前一周（5月22日）基督教 Sinn al-Fil区发生另一起汽车炸弹袭击，造成48人死亡
nodes.support_text: On May 22, a car bomb killed 48 people and wounded 120 in the Christian Sinn al-Fil district.

nodes.description: 本月早些时候东贝鲁特Phalange党旧址外发生汽车炸弹袭击，未造成伤亡
nodes.support_text: Another car bomb exploded last month outside a former Phalange Party office in East Beirut, but caused no casualties.

nodes.description: 基督教民兵与穆斯林武装的七日停火被打破，双方在第七日持续进行火箭炮和炮击战
nodes.support_text: Fighting Flared a Week Ago The threat of retaliation today by the Lebanese Forces seemed likely to touch off an...

nodes.description: 基督教广播电台公开宣称报复，将穆斯林武装称为『犯罪脏战』，并警告报复力度将与其罪行相当
nodes.support_text: The Lebanese Forces militia branded their Moslem foes ''criminals who want a dirty war''. The radio added, ''Our revenge will be as powerful as their crimes''.

nodes.description: 穆斯林总理Rashid Karami将袭击者斥为『没有血液的野兽』
nodes.support_text: Prime Minister Rashid Karami, a Moslem, described the bombers as ''wild beasts who have no blood running in their veins''.

nodes.description: 贝鲁特西部穆斯林区因持续炮击（夜间居民躲藏于地下设施）暂未报告伤亡
nodes.support_text: In the mostly Moslem western part of the city... the shelling began late at night when residents huddle in basements and bunkers.

nodes.description: 救援人员在浓烟中持续四小时艰难进入地下储藏室
nodes.support_text: Fifteen bodies were dug from the basement storeroom eight hours after the blast, and a search for other victims continued well after nightfall.

nodes.description: 救援人员最终成功抵达地下储藏室
nodes.support_text: 救援人员最终成功抵达地下储藏室

nodes.description: 大量男性和儿童从阳台和窗户呼救
nodes.support_text: Scores of men, women and children screamed for help from balconies and windows

nodes.description: 消防员和基督徒民兵攀爬梯子以救援幸存者
nodes.support_text: 消防员和基督徒民兵攀爬梯子以救援幸存者

nodes.description: 伤者踉跄穿过烟雾
nodes.support_text: 伤者踉跄穿过烟雾

nodes.description: 爆炸物专家检查了汽车残骸
nodes.support_text: explosives experts examined the remains of the auto

nodes.description: 爆炸、绑架和街头战斗摧毁了贝鲁特西部
nodes.support_text: explosions, kidnappings, street battles destroyed the western part of the city

nodes.description: 报复威胁引发新一轮暴力浪潮
nodes.support_text: The threat of retaliation today by the Lebanese Forces seemed likely to touch off an...

nodes.description: 警方确认至少51人死亡
nodes.support_text: 警方确认至少51人死亡

nodes.description: 警方报告260余人受伤
nodes.support_text: 警方报告260余人受伤

nodes.description: 总统无力阻止持续冲突
nodes.support_text: 总统无力阻止持续冲突

nodes.description: 汽车炸弹袭击与教派争端关联
nodes.support_text: 汽车炸弹袭击与教派争端关联

nodes.description: 穆斯林领导人强化基督教势力

edges.support_text: Fifteen bodies were dug from the basement storeroom eight hours after the blast...
Screaming Christian militiamen fired rifles to clear a path through traffic for ambulances.
The Lebanese Forces militia branded their Moslem foes ''criminals who want a dirty war''.
Prime Minister Rashid Karami, a Moslem, described the bombers as ''wild beasts who have no blood running in their veins''.
In the mostly Moslem western part of the city... the shelling began late at night when residents huddle in basements and bunkers.
爆炸发生后两小时内，消防员和民兵通过枪击疏通交通
爆炸发生在贝鲁特东部的Melki超市附近...
Rescuers said many bodies were charred beyond recognition.
救援人员持续到深夜后仍在搜索其他受害者
爆炸8小时后从超市地下室挖出15具尸体
On May 22, a car bomb killed 48 people and wounded 120 in the Christian Sinn al-Fil district.
Another car bomb exploded last month outside a former Phalange Party office in East Beirut, but caused no casualties.
Fighting Flared a Week Ago... as fighting entered its seventh day.
救援人员佩戴安全头盔，在浓烟中持续四小时艰难进入地下储藏室
贝鲁特西部因持续炮击暂未报告伤亡
